a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Global crop production by farm size, 2010
Global crop production is measured in kilocalories per year. Farm size is measured in hectares.
Data source: Ricciardi et al. (2018), How much of the world's food do smallholders produce?. Global Food Security.
